name: SKInterpolationMode
desc: The modes used to interpolate between keyframes in the sequence.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: Values between two keyframes are interpolated linearly.

items.name: case spline
items.desc: Values between two keyframes using a spline curve.

items.name: case step
items.desc: Values between two keyframes are not interpolated. Instead, the value is that of the most recent keyframe.
